name: secure-upload
description: skynet kernel module to securely upload files to skynet

scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build-prep: npm run webpack && npm run make-build-script && mv dist-build/build.js dist-build/build.mjs
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run build-prep && node ./dist-build/build.mjs prod

author: David Vorick
